title: Police Alternative Works, Pumpkin Spice Hold The Backlash 09.13.22
itunes:title: Police Alternative Works, Pumpkin Spice Hold The Backlash 09.13.22
description:
In episode 1329, Jack and Miles are joined by writer, comedian, and co-host of The Bechdel Cast, Caitlin Durante, to discuss… Herschel Walker Is Leading With Some of the Worst Takes Possible…, Denver’s Pilot Program For Policing Alternative Appears To Be Working, Pumpkin Spice Has Officially Won and more!

  1. Herschel Walker Is Leading With Some of the Worst Takes Possible…
  2. Denver’s Pilot Program For Policing Alternative Appears To Be Working
  3. The world’s first ‘Pumpkin Spice Energy Drink’ has arrived
  4. Pumpkin Spice Has Officially Won
  5. MARTHA STEWART PROCLAIMS PUMPKIN SPICE IS FOR ‘BASIC BITCHES ONLY’
  6. Martha Stewart Bared It All To Show Her Love For Pumpkin Spice

LISTEN: Silk Rock feat. Lætitia Sadier by Haha Sounds Collective

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
